• Browser-based multiplayer mining game with procedurally generated worlds
  • Supports both desktop and mobile controls with touch-friendly UI
  • Features real-time multiplayer via MQTT with admin roles and map synchronization
  • Includes shop system, inventory management, and cloud save functionality
  • Uses IndexedDB for local storage and Puter cloud for cross-device saves

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players dig for resources, upgrade equipment, and trade with others. The game features procedural world generation, real-time multiplayer via MQTT, mobile-friendly controls, and cloud saves. Players can build structures, use explosives, and travel between discovered teleporters while managing fuel, cargo, and health in a persistent underground world.
